abstract.text: The most frequently asked questions about FreemiumKit.
Learn how FreemiumKit deals with validation and how it helps you focus on what’s important – your app’s features!
Simple In-App Purchases and Subscriptions for Apple Platforms:
Automation, Paywalls, A/B Testing, Live Notifications, PPP, and more.
See how easy it is to migrate from RevenueCat with our detailed migration guide – takes only ~30 minutes (including read time). And learn about some limitations we currently have.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: I use RevenueCat, how can I migrate?
How does the Pricing work in detail?

abstract.text: Learn how we calculate your monthly income and what happens if you exceed your current plan.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How can I apply my custom server-side limits?

abstract.text: Learn how you can recognize a purchased user across app installs and devices to roll your own server-side logic for custom limits.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How does FreemiumKit handle User Privacy?

abstract.text: Learn how FreemiumKit was designed to keep your users data private and reduce the exposure of your purchase data to a minimum.
Learn why you can trust FreemiumKit to scale with your app and why there’s no long-term lock-in risk for your app.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How does FreemiumKit work? Can I trust it?

abstract.text: Learn how to set up your app for our paywalls and live push notifications.
